languages.text: Whenever the wearer uses {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g}, {g|f:af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}Danse Macabre{/g}, {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Dash{/g}, or {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g}, they gain +<u>(AGI bonus + PER bonus)</u>% armour penetration and dodge penetration until the end of their turn. Stacks up to 3 times.

languages.original_text: При применении {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Рывка{/g}, {g|f:7daf9f9d4c3d44ccaeebb0b9a7725b54}Пляски смерти{/g}, {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Пробежки{/g} или {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Смерти свыше{/g} персонаж получает +{uip|Penetration|c2d196acb09341a8a9796e59781823ed}% к {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитию брони{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижению уклонения{/g} до конца своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}. Суммируется до 3 раз.

Stacks up to 3 times.

languages.text: Takan kişi; {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Hücum{/g}, {g|f:7daf9f9d4c3d44ccaeebb0b9a7725b54}Meşum Raks{/g}, {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Atılım{/g} veya {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Tepeden Yağan Ölüm{/g} kabiliyetlerini kullandığında +%{uip|Penetration|c2d196acb09341a8a9796e59781823ed} kadar {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}zırh delme{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}kaçınma azaltımı{/g} değeri kazanır. Bu etkiler {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} sonuna dek sürer. 3 kez üst üste birikebilir.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer uses {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g}, {g|f:7daf9f9d4c3d44ccaeebb0b9a7725b54}Danse Macabre{/g}, {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Dash{/g}, or {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g}, they gain +{uip|Penetration|c2d196acb09341a8a9796e59781823ed}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. traits.locale_text: Takan kişi; {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Hücum{/g}, {g|f:af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}Meşum Raks{/g}, {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Atılım{/g} veya {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Tepeden Yağan Ölüm{/g} kabiliyetlerini kullandığında +%{uip|Penetration|c2d196acb09341a8a9796e59781823ed} kadar {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}zırh delme{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}kaçınma azaltımı{/g} değeri kazanır. Bu etkiler {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} sonuna dek sürer. 3 kez üst üste birikebilir.

Takan kişi; {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Hücum{/g}, {g|f:af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}Meşum Raks{/g}, {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Atılım{/g} veya {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Tepeden Yağan Ölüm{/g} kabiliyetlerini kullandığında +%<u>(ÇEV bonusu + ALG bonusu)</u> kadar zırh delme ve kaçınma değerleri kazanır. Bu etkiler turunun sonuna dek sürer. 3 kez üst üste birikebilir.

languages.text: Cada vez que el portador usa {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Carga{/g}, {g|f:7daf9f9d4c3d44ccaeebb0b9a7725b54}Danza macabra{/g}, {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Carrera {/g}o {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Muerte desde el cielo{/g}, gana +{uip|Penetration|c2d196acb09341a8a9796e59781823ed} % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}reducción de esquiva{/g} hasta el final de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Este efecto se acumula un máximo de 3 veces.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer uses {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g}, {g|f:7daf9f9d4c3d44ccaeebb0b9a7725b54}Danse Macabre{/g}, {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Dash{/g}, or {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g}, they gain +{uip|Penetration|c2d196acb09341a8a9796e59781823ed}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks up to 3 times.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el portador usa {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Carga{/g}, {g|f:af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}Danza macabra{/g}, {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Carrera {/g}o {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Muerte desde el cielo{/g}, gana +{uip|Penetration|c2d196acb09341a8a9796e59781823ed} % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}reducción de esquiva{/g} hasta el final de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Este efecto se acumula un máximo de 3 veces.

languages.text: 每当装备者使用{g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}英勇冲锋{/g}、{g|f:7daf9f9d4c3d44ccaeebb0b9a7725b54}死亡轮舞{/g}、{g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}急速冲刺{/g}或{g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}死从天降{/g}时，装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}闪避减免{/g}提高{uip|Penetration|c2d196acb09341a8a9796e59781823ed}%，最多可叠加3次，效果持续至装备者{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer uses {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g}, {g|f:7daf9f9d4c3d44ccaeebb0b9a7725b54}Danse Macabre{/g}, {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Dash{/g}, or {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g}, they gain +{uip|Penetration|c2d196acb09341a8a9796e59781823ed}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks up to 3 times.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者使用{g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}英勇冲锋{/g}、{g|f:af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}死亡轮舞{/g}、{g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}急速冲刺{/g}或{g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}死从天降{/g}时，装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}闪避减免{/g}提高{uip|Penetration|c2d196acb09341a8a9796e59781823ed}%，最多可叠加3次，效果持续至装备者{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。

languages.text: Wenn der Träger {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Ansturm{/g}, {g|f:7daf9f9d4c3d44ccaeebb0b9a7725b54}Totentanz{/g}, {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Sprinten{/g} oder {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Tod von oben{/g} einsetzt, erhält er bis zum Ende seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} +{uip|Penetration|c2d196acb09341a8a9796e59781823ed} % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweichen-Reduktion{/g}. Kann bis zu 3 Mal gestapelt werden.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer uses {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g}, {g|f:7daf9f9d4c3d44ccaeebb0b9a7725b54}Danse Macabre{/g}, {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Dash{/g}, or {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g}, they gain +{uip|Penetration|c2d196acb09341a8a9796e59781823ed}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks up to 3 times.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Träger {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Ansturm{/g}, {g|f:af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}Totentanz{/g}, {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Sprinten{/g} oder {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Tod von oben{/g} einsetzt, erhält er bis zum Ende seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} +{uip|Penetration|c2d196acb09341a8a9796e59781823ed} % {g|Encyclopedia:Rüstungsdurchdringung} und {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweichen-Reduktion{/g}. Kann bis zu 3 Mal gestapelt werden.

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur utilise {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g}, {g|f:7daf9f9d4c3d44ccaeebb0b9a7725b54}Danse macabre{/g}, {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Sprint{/g} ou {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Mort venue du ciel{/g}, il gagne +{uip|Penetration|c2d196acb09341a8a9796e59781823ed} % à la {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} et à la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}réduction d'esquive{/g} jusqu'à la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. Cumulable jusqu'à 3 fois.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer uses {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g}, {g|f:7daf9f9d4c3d44ccaeebb0b9a7725b54}Danse Macabre{/g}, {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Dash{/g}, or {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g}, they gain +{uip|Penetration|c2d196acb09341a8a9796e59781823ed}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks up to 3 times.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur utilise {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g}, {g|f:af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}Danse macabre{/g}, {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Sprint{/g} ou {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Mort venue du ciel{/g}, il gagne +{uip|Penetration|c2d196acb09341a8a9796e59781823ed} % à la {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} et à la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}réduction d'esquive{/g} jusqu'à la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. Cumulable jusqu'à 3 fois.

Chaque fois que le porteur utilise {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g}, {g|f:af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}Danse macabre{/g}, {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Sprint{/g} ou {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Mort venue du ciel{/g}, il gagne +{uip|Penetration|c2d196acb09341a8a9796e59781823ed} % à la {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} et à la pénétration d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} jusqu'à la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. Cumulable jusqu'à 3 fois.

languages.text: 使用者が{g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}突撃{/g}、{g|f:af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}死の舞踏{/g}、{g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}ダッシュ{/g}、または{g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}天からの死{/g}を使用する場合、{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}回避貫通{/g}が+{uip|Penetration|c2d196acb09341a8a9796e59781823ed}%される。最大3回までスタックする。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer uses {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g}, {g|f:af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}Danse Macabre{/g}, {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Dash{/g}, or {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g}, they gain +{uip|Penetration|c2d196acb09341a8a9796e59781823ed}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks up to 3 times.

traits.locale_text: 使用者が{g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}突撃{/g}、{g|f:af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}死の舞踏{/g}、{g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}ダッシュ{/g}、または{g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}天からの死{/g}を使用する場合、ターンの終了までアーマー貫通と回避貫通が+<u>（AGIボーナス+PERボーナス）</u>%される。最大3回までスタックする。
